name: A Jedi's Focus
Lore: 'Vader was surprised at how far the ''young apprentice'' had come in his training.',
Text: 'USED: If you have a character with a lightsaber in battle, all opponent''s aliens at same site are power -1 for remainder of turn ( -2 if alien is non-unique).LOST: If a duel was just initiated, add the destiny number of the top card of your Lost Pile to your total.',
